description: After his sister is turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to save her and fight deadly demons. With stunning animation and an emotional story, Demon Slayer is a powerful tale of courage and family.

When high schooler Yuji Itadori swallows a cursed object, he gains extraordinary powers and joins Jujutsu High to battle deadly cursed spirits. With unforgettable characters and intense action, Jujutsu Kaisen delivers a supernatural adventure you won’t want to miss!

Japan’s desire for World Cup glory leads the Japanese Football Association to launch a new rigorous training program to find the national team’s next striker. Three hundred high school players are pitted against each other
